LOGIN.HEADING: Log in to Artstor Admin
LOGIN.TERMS: By using Artstor Digital Library, I agree to the Terms
LOGIN.LOGIN_HELP: Having trouble logging in? Contact support@artstor.org

MESSAGES.UNAUTHORIZED: Invalid email address or password. Try again.
MESSAGES.SERVICE_ERROR: Server is not responding. Please try again later.
MESSAGES.USERNAME_REQUIRED: Please enter the email associated with your Admin account.
MESSAGES.PASSWORD_REQUIRED: Please enter the password associated with your Admin account

ARTSTOR_STATS.CONTENT: For usage statistics go to the Artstor Stats Site

QUESTIONS_TRAINING.CONTENT: support@artstor.org with questions and to schedule an Admin training online.

PROMO.HDR: Need materials to promote Artstor at your institution?
PROMO.CONTENT: Go to Promotional materials for more information.

LOCAL_SUPPORT.TXT2: Go to User accounts to assign Admin privileges to another user.

MESSAGES.UNAUTHORIZED: Unauthorized user. Please sign-in with admin account.
MESSAGES.SERVICE_ERROR: Server is not responding. Please try again later.

MESSAGES.CONTACT_INFO_ERROR: There was an error while retrieving the contact information. Please try again or contact support.
MESSAGES.VALID_PWD: Password must be 7-20 characters long and should not contain any special characters.
MESSAGES.SERVICE_ERROR: Server is not responding. Please try again later.

LABELS.NOTE: Note: This email address will also be displayed on the Search & Browse page of the digital library.

TEXTS.PROMO_MATERIALS: To make the most of Artstor at your institution, go to Promotional materials.
TEXTS.LOCAL_SUPPORT: There are locations in Artstor where your institution can publish local support contact information.
TEXTS.EMAILS: Emails sent from the Admin site will include the following contact information:

REGISTER_MODAL.INVALID_EMAIL_ALERT: {{ email }} is not a valid email address and was removed.

USER_REGISTRATION_ERRORS.GENERIC_ERROR: Registration failed for {{ email }}. Please try again, or contact support.
USER_REGISTRATION_ERRORS.ACCOUNT_ALREADY_EXISTS: Registration failed for {{ email }} because an account with that email already exists.

REGISTER_MODAL.EMAIL_REQUIRED_ERROR: At least one email is required
REGISTER_MODAL.SERVICE_ERROR: There was an issue processing your request. Please try again or contact support.

SESSION_EXPIRE.MESSAGE: We logged you out after being idle for 30 minutes. Please login again.
